rules.name: api
rules.yamlContent:
http:
  routers:
    api:
      rule: Host(`api.vm.local`)
      service: api
      entryPoints:
        - websecure
      priority: 50
      tls: {}
  services:
    api:
      loadBalancer:
        servers:
          - url: http://10.0.0.20:9000
        passHostHeader: false
        sticky:
          cookie:
            name: sticky

rules.name: app
rules.yamlContent:
http:
  routers:
    app:
      rule: Host(`app.vm.local`)
      service: app
      entryPoints:
        - web
        - websecure
      middlewares:
        - compress
      tls:
        certResolver: letsencrypt
  services:
    app:
      loadBalancer:
        servers:
          - url: http://10.0.0.10:8080
          - url: http://10.0.0.11:8080
        passHostHeader: true
        healthCheck:
          path: /health
          interval: 30s

rules.name: grafana-rtr
rules.yamlContent:
http:
  routers:
    grafana-rtr:
      rule: Host(`grafana.{{ env "DOMAINNAME_1" }}`)
      service: grafana-rtr
      entryPoints:
        - websecure
      middlewares:
        - chain-no-auth
      tls:
        certResolver: dns-cloudflare
  services:
    grafana-rtr:
      loadBalancer:
        servers:
          - url: http://{{ env "SERVERIP_CRITICAL" }}:9823
        serversTransport: grafana
        passHostHeader: true

rules.name: asustor-rtr
rules.yamlContent:
http:
  routers:
    asustor-rtr:
      rule: 'Host(`asus.{{ env "DOMAINNAME_1" }}`)'
      entryPoints:
        - websecure
      middlewares:
        - chain-authelia
        # - chain-internal
      service: asustor-svc
      tls:
        certResolver: dns-cloudflare
        options: tls-opts@file

  services:
    asustor-svc:
      loadBalancer:
        passHostHeader: true
        serversTransport: "asus"
        servers:
          - url: 'https://{{ env "SERVERIP_NAS" }}:1739'

  serversTransports:
    asus:
      insecureSkipVerify: true

rules.yamlContent:
http:
  routers:
    qbittorrent-rtr:
      rule: 'Host(`qbittorrent.{{ env "DOMAINNAME_1" }}`)'
      entryPoints:
        - websecure
      middlewares:
        - chain-authelia
      service: qbittorrent-svc
      tls:
        certResolver: dns-cloudflare
        options: tls-opts@file

  services:
    qbittorrent-svc:
      loadBalancer:
        passHostHeader: true
        serversTransport: "qbittorrent"
        servers:
          - url: 'http://{{ env "SERVERIP_MEDIA" }}:8085'

  serversTransports:
    qbittorrent:
      insecureSkipVerify: true

rules.name: landing-page-rtr
rules.yamlContent:
http:
  routers:
    landing-page-rtr:
      rule: 'Host(`{{ env "DOMAINNAME_1" }}`) || Host(`www.{{ env "DOMAINNAME_1" }}`)'
      entryPoints:
        - websecure
      middlewares:
        - chain-no-auth
      service: landing-page-svc
      tls:
        certResolver: dns-cloudflare
        options: tls-opts@file

    # HTTP router (for redirection)
    landing-page-rtr-http:
      rule: 'Host(`{{ env "DOMAINNAME_1" }}`)'
      entryPoints:
        - web
      middlewares:
        - https-redirect
      service: landing-page-svc

  services:
    landing-page-svc:
      loadBalancer:
        passHostHeader: true
        serversTransport: "landing-page"
        servers:
          - url: 'http://{{ env "SERVERIP_PRODUCTION" }}:2001'

  serversTransports:
    landing-page:
      insecureSkipVerify: true

  
  middlewares:
    https-redirect:
      redirectScheme:
        scheme: https
        permanent: true

rules.name: landing-page-rtr-http
rules.yamlContent:
http:
  routers:
    landing-page-rtr:
      rule: 'Host(`{{ env "DOMAINNAME_1" }}`) || Host(`www.{{ env "DOMAINNAME_1" }}`)'
      entryPoints:
        - websecure
      middlewares:
        - chain-no-auth
      service: landing-page-svc
      tls:
        certResolver: dns-cloudflare
        options: tls-opts@file

    # HTTP router (for redirection)
    landing-page-rtr-http:
      rule: 'Host(`{{ env "DOMAINNAME_1" }}`)'
      entryPoints:
        - web
      middlewares:
        - https-redirect
      service: landing-page-svc

  services:
    landing-page-svc:
      loadBalancer:
        passHostHeader: true
        serversTransport: "landing-page"
        servers:
          - url: 'http://{{ env "SERVERIP_PRODUCTION" }}:2001'

  serversTransports:
    landing-page:
      insecureSkipVerify: true

  
  middlewares:
    https-redirect:
      redirectScheme:
        scheme: https
        permanent: true

rules.name: n8n-rtr
rules.yamlContent:
http:
  routers:
    n8n-rtr:
      rule: 'Host(`n8n.{{ env "DOMAINNAME_1" }}`)'
      entryPoints:
        - websecure
      middlewares:
        - n8n-headers  # Add this middleware
      service: n8n-svc
      tls:
        certResolver: dns-cloudflare
        options: tls-opts@file

  middlewares:
    n8n-headers:
      headers:
        customRequestHeaders:
          X-Forwarded-Proto: "https"
          X-Forwarded-For: ""
        customResponseHeaders:
          X-Frame-Options: "SAMEORIGIN"

  services:
    n8n-svc:
      loadBalancer:
        passHostHeader: true
        servers:
          - url: 'http://{{ env "SERVERIP_PRODUCTION" }}:5678'
